document.full_text: the governor of the afghan jail where hundreds of insurgents this week escaped through a tunnel built by the taliban has been detained along with several top aides, an intelligence source told reuters on thursday.
document.title: kandahar jail governor detained after mass breakout
lines_and_colors: the governor of the afghan jail where hundreds of insurgents this week escaped through a tunnel built by the taliban has been detained along with several top aides, an intelligence source told reuters on thursday.
